entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as being in a conversation with Mr. Weasley and Molly.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: A person who is part of Harry's conversation, banging his fist on the table.

entities.name: molly
entities.description: Molly Weasley, a person in a conversation with Mr. Weasley and Harry.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: A person who wanted the incident kept quiet from the press.

entities.name: black
entities.description: A person who escaped from Azkaban and is talking in his sleep about Harry being at Hogwarts.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned as a reason why Harry would be safe at the school.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: A prison where Black was kept for twelve years.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: The school that Harry attends and is mentioned as a place where Black thinks Harry is.

relationships.description: Black was kept in Azkaban for twelve years.
Fudge wanted the incident kept quiet from the press.
Black wants to harm Harry, as mentioned in his sleep.
Dumbledore is headmaster of Hogwarts and would protect Harry.
